children.name: ENERGY CONNECTIONS
children.statement: GE’s Electrification and Automation Business. We bring the world reliable, efficient energy. We enable utilities and industry to efficiently manage electricity from the point of generation to the point of consumption.

children.name: POWER CONVERSION
children.statement: We apply the science and systems of power conversion to help drive the electric transformation of the world’s energy infrastructure.

children.name: MOTORS
children.statement: GE manufactured motors and generators for some of the first commercial and industrial electrical applications. We continue to deliver innovative electrical and mechanical power solutions to the world. Our machines efficiently operate in challenging applications and severe environments where reliability and ease of maintenance is critical.

children.name: DRIVES
children.statement: GE’s Power Conversion drives can substantially improve the quality and efficiency of your process or production. GE’s drive technology delivers efficient and flexible control of electric power to a wide range of driven equipment. GE drives can feed both induction and synchronous machines with high performance vector control across all speed ranges. For multiple drive applications with both motoring and regenerating drives, a common DC link fed by a single active front end can reduce overall equipment cost and footprint.
offerings: Low Voltage Variable Speed Drives - 400V to 690V – LV7000
Medium Voltage Variable Speed Drives - 3.3KV to 11KV – MV6, MV7000, SER (Slip Energy Recovery) Drive

children.name: INVERTERS
children.statement: GE’s Power Conversion business provides a complete range of central inverters based on a modular and compact approach, and specifically designed for the solar industry. As part of GE’s ongoing development in power electronics technology, the solar inverters build on extensive experience with designing, manufacturing and installing more than 34 GW of converters for the renewable energy industry, and decades of experience in controls for a wide range of utility applications. The installed base covers the full range of utility scale requirements, including converters to meet stringent grid code requirements in extreme environmental conditions.

children.name: Rail DC Traction and Static Frequency Converters
children.statement: GE Power Conversion provides special power supply solutions like railway network frequency conversion stations and research pulse generators as well as control systems for rail applications to support in provision of reliable, efficient energy for rail transport.

children.name: SOFTWARE
children.statement: Provision of  operation and information technology solutions to electricity market, transmission and distribution  network operators, managing the real-time generation of electricity and the reliable delivery from generators to consumers.  Supplying geospatial information systems (GIS)  for the efficient design and modeling of complex network infrastructures while supporting asset management lifecycle processes for electrical, telco, and oil and gas pipelines.
offerings: Network Control Centre Software (Electrical, Oil & Gas) (EMS/DMS)

children.name: GRID AUTOMATION
children.statement: Provision of Substation Protection and Control products, systems and engineering to be used in all voltage ranges from MV (6.6kV) to EHV (500kV).   Provides solutions for Customers to provide protection, control systems, SCADA, remote access and asset performance management utilising wide range of technology and standards Protection Relays (Multilin, Micom, UR, Midos).

children.name: PROJECTS AND ENGINEERING
children.statement: Solution Provider for Electricity Network businesses providing turnkey optimised engineered project delivery utilising products and technology solutions from the wider GE community.  Covering all facets from conceptual design, network studies, specification, procurement, detailed engineering, project management, FAT, construction and commissioning.   New technology and alternative solutions can be provided to solve Electricity Network issues.
offerings: Engineering and projects for Electrical Networks
High Voltage Plant and Transformers above 33kV
HV DC and Reactive Power support

children.name: SERVICES
children.statement: Providing to owners of Network Electrical infrastructure a high quality, innovative and sustainable products services to deliver cost effective “future proof” optimised assets.  Through the utilisation of our global transmission expertise, our local technical specialists provide you with customised services, training, spares and long term support.  Offering hardware and software products to develop the backbone of a  new digital control system while ensuring a  seamless transition with existing  operating systems
offerings: electrical network asset maintenance and performance
electrical networks asset single inspection to long term operations and maintenance
training on all facets of electrical networks materials, technology and systems

children.name: HIGH VOLTAGE EQUIPMENT
children.statement: World leading supplier of High voltage equipment (33kV and above) and Power Transformers for Network Owners, Industry and Infrastructure customers

children.name: INDUSTRIAL SOLUTIONS
children.statement: We create advanced technologies that safely, reliably and efficiently distribute and control electricity to protect people, property and equipment; We also provide high performance control solutions for a connected world. Low Voltage electrical components - Distributed by IPD, NHP, Vynco (NZ)
offerings: LV & MV switchgear, distribution boards and motor control - <41kV
MV transformers - Resin type. up to 33kV, <15MVA
UPS (single and three phase) up to 600kVA

children.name: LOW VOLTAGE & MEDIUM VOLTAGE SWITCHGEAR
children.statement: We create advanced technologies that safely, reliably and efficiently distribute and control electricity to protect people, property and equipment; We also provide high performance control solutions for a connected world. Low Voltage electrical components - Distributed by IPD, NHP, Vynco (NZ)

children.name: DIRECT CURRENT SWITCHGEAR
children.statement: AKD-20 low-voltage switchgear continues the tradition of the AKD switchgear line while delivering enhanced arc flash protection. Its protection features include non-vented panels plus insulated and isolated bus, and it integrates our new state-of-the-art EntelliGuard® breaker-trip unit system. It also features an optimized footprint so that it now fits into a smaller area for the most common configurations

children.name: TRANSFER SWITCHES
children.statement: Fully Automatic, Transparent Dual-Source Switching - GE is a key supplier of static transfer switches to a wide range of industries. The GE static transfer switch supplies critical loads with a choice between two available sources of electrical power. By continually monitoring power quality, the switch automatically transfers to an alternate source without interruption of power to even your most sensitive critical loads.
offerings: Transfer Switches - transfer time of less than 4ms

children.name: UPS
children.statement: GE's UPS product category provide compact, lightweight and cost-effective Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) that connects between the main power supply and your critical load to ensure a clean, constant and reliable source of power. The product protects your hardware and data and ensures operations are reliably maintained.
offerings: UPS (single and three phase) - Up to 600kVA

children.name: AUTOMATION & CONTROL
children.statement: To enable customers in energy and manufacturing to optimize equipment performance and ensure reliable and efficient operations by connecting their machines, data, insights and people. To harness the power of the Industrial Internet for our customers, helping them solve their most complicated business challenges
offerings: Shop Floor HMI and Touch panels

children.name: POWER
children.statement: Power is the division within GE that is responsible for developing, selling and maintaining Gas Turbines, Steam Turbines and Boilers, Nuclear Reactors, Reciprocating (piston) Engines and Water Treatment technologies and chemicals. With the exception of those Water Treatment technologies and chemicals, Power's technologies and services are generally centered around non-renewable fuel sources (such as fossil fuels) for the purposes of generating electricity at the commercial and utility scale.

children.name: GAS POWER SYSTEMS
children.statement: Gas Power Systems is the department within Power which is responsible for developing, and selling Gas and Steam Turbines and Boilers for utility scale power generation.It offers transportable gas turbines for rapid deployment and installation as well as larger fixed turbine and boiler technologies for applications requiring large amounts of power quickly and efficiently.Although its Steam Turbines can be used in renewable energy applications (such as geothermal), Gas Power Systems is centered around the use of non-renewable fuel sources (such as fossil fuels) and can often combust a variety of hydrocarbon liquids and gases.

children.name: POWER SERVICES
children.statement: Power Services is the department within Power which is responsible for commissioning, maintaining and enhancing the product portfolio offered by Gas Power Systems (i.e. Gas and Steam Turbines and Boilers).

children.name: WATER AND DISTRIBUTED POWER
children.statement: Water & Distributed Power are affectively two descrete business opertating with a common CEO under the greater Power division.Water is responsible for..Distributed Power is responsible for developing, selling and maintaining reciprocating (piston) engines used for power generation and mechanical drive applications.

children.name: DISTRIBUTED POWER
children.statement: Distributed Power is the department within Power responsible for reciprocating (piston) engines.Its Jenbacher engines can burn a variety of gases and target the power generation space where efficiency is paramount. There is one model available for diesel applications.Its Waukesha engines can burn gases with greater variability. Although they can be used in some power generation applications they tend to be used in driving other mechanical devices (namely compressors in the O&G sector).These products and services are channelled through Authorized Channel Partners in ANZ.

children.name: Chemical & Monitoring Solutions
children.statement: The expertise to solve our customers’ toughest water and process challenges wherever they occur.

children.name: Engineered Systems
children.statement: The expertise to solve our customers’ toughest water and process challenges wherever they occur

children.name: RENEWABLE ENERGY
children.statement: Renewable Energy is the division responsible for developing, selling and maintaining power generation technologies that are fueled by renewable energy sources (such as wind) at the commercial and utility scale.The primary portfolio includes both on and off-shore wind turbines and hydro turbines. There are products and services to support areas such as  solar, geothermal and tidal as well.Wind Turbines from 2MW-6MW

children.name: Onshore wind
children.statement: Onshore Wind is the department within Renewable Energy which is responsible for developing, selling and maintaining utility scale wind turbine generators for on-land applications.

children.name: OFFSHORE WIND
children.statement: Offshore Wind is the department within Renewable Energy which is responsible for developing, selling and maintaining utility scale wind turbine generators for on-water applications.

children.name: HYDRO
children.statement: Hydro is the department within Renewable Energy which is responsible for developing, selling and maintaining hydro turbine generators for the purposes of generating electricity at the commercial and utility scales

children.name: OTHER RENEWABLES
children.statement: Renewable Energy is also capable of supporting commercial and utility scale geothermal, solar and tital opportunities in some instances.

children.name: TRANSPORTATION
children.statement: GE Transportation is industrial leader and supplier to the rail, mining, marine, stationary power and drilling industries. Its solutions help customers deliver goods and services with greater speed and greater savings  using advanced manufacturing techniques, industry expertise and connected machines. This business has its headquarters in Chicago.

children.name: GLOBAL LOCOMOTIVE OPERATIONS
children.statement: As a sub-business GLO is responsible for manufacturing diesel-electric locomotives.GLO has produced a succession of world-class models and developed advanced rail technology that reduces operating costs, decreases fuel use, minimizes downtime and complies with stringent emissions standards. Today, more than 17,000 of GE Transportation’s locomotives operate in 50 countries.

children.name: GLOBAL SERVICES OPERATIONS
children.statement: As a sub business ,Global locomotive services(GSO) provide customers with the right support right when they need it—with a goal of increasing product reliability,improving asset utilization and reducing operating expenses.Our comprehensive offerings include tailored service programs, high-quality parts for GE, EMD* and other locomotive platforms; overhaul, repair and upgrade services, and wreck repair. Our remote monitoring and diagnostics technologies are also playing a growing part in providing timely service to increase locomotive uptime.
offerings: Material suppply - e.g. Scheduled, unscheduled parts supply
Service guarantees - e.g. availability and reliability guarantees
AESS - Automation Engine Start and Stop

children.name: DIGITAL SOLUTIONS
children.statement: As a sub-business, Digital solutions business offers software solutions for rail and mining customers  focused on critical outcomes that help manage and optimize Transportation assets, increase utilization, reduce dwell time, save fuel, and increase velocity.

children.name: TRAIN PERFORMANCE
children.statement: As a sub-business of digital solutions, this enables mobile datacentre capability on the locomotive with industry leading optimisation solutions such as trip optimiser which can deliver substantial cost savings to our customers.
offerings: GoLINC - GoLINC is an industry-tested network, communication, and application management platform for the railroad environment.
LOCOTROL Distributed Power System  - It is a proven control and communication system that enables coordinated braking and traction power distribution between lead and remote locomotives
Trip Optimizer is an intelligent, fuel-saving cruise control for locomotive that optimizes fuel consumption based on a specific train’s make up and the route traveled offering 3%-17% fuel savings

children.name: OPTIMISATION SOLUTIONS
children.statement: As a sub-business of digital solutions, this offers a range of optimisation and automation solutions for rail road operators. Key applications of the software include rail network optimsiation, document and asset management and automation of train operations.
offerings: Movement planner - this software solution addressess real time line of road planning and execution. It is used to optimise customers rail network helping reduce network congestion and increase capacity without laying further capital investment.

Yard Planner - is an advanced software solution that provides for real-time planning and optimization of a rail classification yard. It helps train masters and yardmasters visualize yard state and plan yard activities and make optimal decisions on asset utilization and resource allocation.

RailDOCS - is a cloud-based mobile software platform for configuration management, testing, inspecting, reporting and maintaining track, signal, bridge and communications equipment. It also provides the means to track and manage signal, train crew and dispatcher employee time and availability.
ShipperConnect - This software helps industrial rail shippers automate rail operations, obtain shipment visibility and manage transportation assets and inventory.

OASIS - is a leading Intermodal terminal operating system which allows operators to enhance yard and gate efficiency, reduce OpEx, increase yard equipment utilization, boost throughput to increase capacity, minimize errors and improve customer services. The system is estimated to save $2/lift in operating costs.
RailConnect TMS  automates daily railroad processes that were previously manual, paper based, and labor intensive. TMS facilitates the seamless interchange of rail traffic between multiple railways.

children.name: CUSTOMER ANALYTICS
children.statement: As a sub-business of digital solutions, this offers custom software development for our customers. Using Predix as the foundation, we can now develop custom software aligned with our customers needs.
offerings: Locolink -  provides centralized monitoring of locomotive health status and performance in real time.
This enables GE to determine root cause of failures while in-transit, and provide timely maintenance and repair recommendations.

children.name: MARINE AND STATIONARY DRILLING
children.statement: As a sub-business, this business encompasses offerings in 3 keys areas - Marine, Drilling and stationary power. Marine Solutions is dedicated to power and propulsion systems for customers in the workboat, merchant, offshore and naval industries. Stationary power offer solutions fpr fuel efficiency, low lifecycle costs and low emissions.Drilling offer GE's  Electric motors for the harshest onshore and offshore applications for the oil and gas industry.
offerings: V228 Diesel Engines and Generator Sets
AC Drill Rig Motors - 1150-1500 HP motors
DC Drill Rig Motors - 752 DC motors.
L250 Marine Engine Tier 3/IMO Tier II

children.name: MINING
children.statement: As a sub-business, GE Mining help businesses through every step of the mining process.  Solutions are designed to address customer challenges such as productivity, efficieny and safety.

children.name: MINING SERVICES
children.statement: As a sub-business of mining, This is the Contracting and mining equipment hire business. Equipment supply from this business helps customers with production, over burden and site related civil work.

children.name: UNDERGROUND MINING EQUIPMENT
children.statement: As a sub-business of mining,Core focus of GE’s mining equipment business, GE Mining Industrea, is to provide whole of mine solutions to improve mining productivity and safety.
offerings: GE Fairchild Battery Powered Load Haul Dump
GE Fairchild Battery Powered Shield Hauler
GE Fairchild Hi-Cap XL Continuous Haulage System
GE Mining Industrea Mine Dozer DZR
GE Mining Industrea GE Mining Equipment Chock Carrier
GE Mining Industrea Load Haul Dump Loader LHD
GE Mining Industrea Mine Cruiser Mk7.0
GE Mining Industrea Utility Vehicle IUV

children.name: PROPULSION SYSTEMS
children.statement: As a sub-business of mining,GE Mining integrated mining propulsion systems enables customers to increase productivity, reduce maintenance costs and improve performance at a time when companies need it most.

children.name: MINING SOLUTIONS
children.statement: As a sub-business of mining,The Mining Solutions business leverage the GE store and works with customers to provide tailored solutions that help reduce costs and enhance operational efficiencies.
offerings: Capital Expenditure to Operational Expenditure: alternate financing structures such as leases
Potash Mining: e.g use water reverse osmosis to increase energy efficiency.
Concentrate Drying: Replaces inefficient fossil fuels systems by using gas turbines to dry copper.
Mine Electrification: Using RailConnect 360 as a single point of contact, will allow for more energy efficient equipment, as well as increased cost and time savings.
Tailings to Energy:  Will test producing energy through tailings waste.

items.name: Resiprocating engine for Mechanical drive or Power Generation
Resiprocating engine for Mechanical drive or Power Generation
Gas Turbines for mechinical drives and power Generations
Services & Maintenance of Gas Power systems
